snippet: The goal scored Saturday by Aston Villa’s Matthew Lowton could be worth about $40 million to Aston Villa if it helps them avoid relegation from the Premier League.
abstract: The goal scored Saturday by Aston Villa’s Matthew Lowton could be worth about $40 million to Aston Villa if it helps them avoid relegation from the Premier League.

headline.main: Was This Aston Villa Goal Worth $50 Million?
